required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: BIOBANK Renal Transplantation University Hospitals Leuven
clinical_study.official_title: Biobank Renal Transplantation University Hospitals Leuven

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to maintain a prospective biobank of human samples obtained from donors and recipients of renal allografts, including biopsy tissue, peripheral blood samples and urine samples.

detailed_description.textblock: Clinical data and bio-specimens are prospectively collected and stored for undefined future translational research projects.

arm_group.description: All de novo renal allograft recipients transplanted at the University Hospitals Leuven

biospec_descr.textblock: Biopsy material (tissue, RNA, DNA) Peripheral blood samples (serum, plasma, RNA, DNA) Urine samples

study_pop.textblock: All donors and recipients of a kidney transplant at the University Hospitals Leuven

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- renal transplant recipients/donors
Exclusion Criteria:

facility.name: Department of Nephrology and Renal Transplantation - University Hospitals Leuven
